plot: Patrick Bateman is twenty-six and he works on Wall Street, he is handsome, sophisticated, charming and intelligent. He is also a psychopath. Taking us to head-on collision with America's greatest dream—and its worst nightmare—American Psycho is bleak, bitter, black comedy about a world we all recognise but do not wish to confront.
characters: Patrick Bateman, Evelyn Richards, Timothy Price, Paul Owen, Luis Carruthers, Courtney Lawrence
setting: New York City, New York Wall Street, New York City, New York Manhattan, New York City, New York
